name: Akai APC40 MkII
description: Chatiagne MIDI Module for the Akai APC40 MkII

Controller Mode.description: Choose how the controller responds to input. The APC40 MkII defaults to Generic Mode on start up. If you're using Resolume it's recommended to choose Alternate Ableton Live Mode.

Debug.description: Set all module logging to TRUE

Clear All.description: Clear the pads - sends NoteOn message with velocity 0, which is black.
Clear the pad - sends NoteOn message with velocity 0, which is black.
Clear the pads - sends NoteOn message with velocity 0, which is black.
